apps.name: Uygulamalar
apps.desc: Şu anda yüklü Google Chrome uygulamalarınızı görüntüler.

bookmarks.name: Yer imleri
bookmarks.desc: Yer imlerinizi ve diğer bağlantıları görüntüler.

chrome_bookmarks.name: Yer imleri
chrome_bookmarks.desc: Displays your Chrome bookmarks, optionally from a specific folder.

calc.name: Hesap makinesi
calc.desc: Temel işlemleri yapabilen bir hesap makinesi gösterir.

calendar.name: Takvim
calendar.desc: Bir veya daha fazla Google takviminizde yaklaşan etkinlikleri gösterir.
calendar.title: Ajanda
calendar.noevents: No events found in the near future, it looks like your schedule's clear!

clock.name: Saat
clock.desc: Offers alarm, time, timer, and stopwatch functionality.
clock.title: Saat

feedly.name: Feedly
feedly.desc: Displays articles from your Feedly account in a configurable format.

settings.mark: Mark an article as read when I

mark_options.scroll: Scroll past it or click it

feedly.author: by

now.name: Google Asistan
now.desc: Uçuş durumu ve paket izlemeleri dahil olmak üzere tüm Google Asistan kartlarını görüntüler.
now.authorize: Google Asistan kartlarınızın burada görüntülenebilmesi için iChrome'a izin vermeniz gerekir.

notifications.name: Google Notifications
notifications.desc: Displays your Google Notifications from services such as Google+

settings.subreddit_help:
Enter any subreddit by the part past /r/ when on Reddit.

For example, Technology is at: http://www.reddit.com/r/technology, therefore you would enter technology
settings.subreddit_placeholder: Enter a subreddit to show links from. (i.e. technology)
settings.click: When I click a link show me

tasks.name: Tasks
tasks.desc: Displays an editable list of tasks from one of your Google Tasks lists.
tasks.title: Tasks
tasks.authorize: You'll need to select a list from your Google Tasks via the settings before anything can be displayed here.

twitter.name: Twitter
twitter.desc: Displays tweets from your home stream or a specified list.
twitter.authorize: You'll need to authorize iChrome first
twitter.authorize_msg: You'll need to give iChrome permission to view tweets from your account before anything will show up here.
twitter.no_tweets: There don't seem to be any tweets here...

wolfram.name: Wolfram|Alpha
wolfram.desc: Inserts a small Wolfram|Alpha search box.

youtube.name: YouTube
youtube.desc: Displays either popular videos or videos from a specified user.

settings.from_help:
This must be an exact username as shown in the URL of the page when you're viewing their profile.

This value never includes spaces.
settings.from_placeholder: Leave blank to show Top Videos

quotes.name: Quotes
quotes.desc: Displays a quote picked either every time you load the page or once daily.

method_options.random: Every time I load the page

html.name: HTML
html.desc: Displays completely custom HTML in an iframe.

sitelink.name: Site Link
sitelink.desc: Displays a link, optionally with a title and thumbnail

stats.name: System Statistics
stats.desc: Keep an eye on your system with realtime statistics

search.name: Ara
search.desc: Embeds a search box in your page for easy access

settings.param_placeholder: The parameter where the query goes, i.e. "q"

pushbullet.name: Pushbullet
pushbullet.desc: Keep track of notifications from your phone and other devices
pushbullet.no_key: It doesn't look like you're signed in to Pushbullet.  Sign in now to connect this widget.

directions.name: Directions
directions.desc: Get directions to and from nearly anywhere right from your homepage
directions.error: Something went wrong while trying to load the directions you requested.
directions.error2: Please check the start and destination addresses you entered.

pocket.name: Pocket
pocket.desc: Display a list of your saved articles, videos, and web pages from Pocket
pocket.no_key: You'll need to give iChrome access to your Pocket account before it can load your links.

analytics.name: Analytics
analytics.desc: Google Analytics profilindeki çeşitli ölçümleri görüntüler.
analytics.noprofile:
Henüz bir profil seçilmiş gibi görünmüyor!

Sağ üstteki ingiliz anahtarı simgesi ile seçmeyi deneyin.

classroom.name: Classroom
classroom.desc: Keep up to date with your Google Classroom assignments and classes

currency.name: Currency
currency.desc: Let's you convert between any two of 169 currencies.

dictionary.name: Dictionary
dictionary.desc: Quickly look up the definition and synonyms for a word
dictionary.search_placeholder: Enter a word or term here

drive.name: Drive
drive.desc: Displays recently changed files from your Google Drive.
drive.authMessage: You'll need to give iChrome permission to view files in your Drive before anything can be shown here.

gmail.name: Gmail
gmail.desc: Displays your Gmail inbox where you can manage your email.

iframe.name: iFrame
iframe.desc: Displays a webpage of your choice within an iframe.

keep.name: Keep
keep.desc: Embeds Google Keep in a widget

news.name: Haberler
news.desc: Displays the current top news by category and edition.

settings.title: Widget başlığı
settings.title_placeholder: Widget için bir başlık girin veya gizlemek için boş bırakın

rss.name: RSS
rss.desc: Displays items from a RSS or Atom feed with optional images.

settings.title: Widget başlığı
settings.title_placeholder: Widget için bir başlık girin veya gizlemek için boş bırakın
settings.link_placeholder: Enter a link for the widget title
settings.feeds_help: Click any feed to edit it
settings.feeds_placeholder: Enter a feed URL and press Enter to add
settings.feeds_pro_only: Only Pro users can have multiple feeds in each widget. Get Pro in the settings.

rss.feed_error:
An error occurred while trying to fetch the feed at: %s.
Please double check the URL and/or modify the widget settings.

sports.name: Spor
sports.desc: Displays scores, schedules, and news from your favorite teams.

settings.teams_placeholder: Enter a team name and press Enter to add

sports.pro_splash1: Sports news is a Pro-only feature.

stocks.name: Stocks
stocks.desc: Displays current information for any given stock symbol.

settings.stocks_placeholder: Type a company or exchange name and hit Enter

stocks.pro_splash1: Realtime data, charts, news, and detailed stock information are Pro-only features.

todo.name: Yapılacaklar
todo.desc: Yapılacaklar listesi ile tamamlanmış ve önemli öğeleri görüntüler.
todo.title: Yapılacaklar listesi

settings.tags_placeholder: Bir etiket adı girin ve Enter tuşuna basın

topsites.name: En iyi siteler
topsites.desc: En çok ziyaret edilen siteleri görüntüler.

traffic.name: Trafik
traffic.desc: Ev ve iş yeri arasındaki geçerli trafik zamanını görüntüler.

settings.work_placeholder: İşe gitmeden önce kullanılması gereken hedef

translate.name: Çeviri
translate.desc: Lets you quickly translate to and from 90 languages as you type

unread.name: Unread
unread.desc: Displays the current number of unread emails in your Gmail inbox.

voice.name: Voice
voice.desc: Displays the current number of missed calls and texts in your Google Voice account.

weather.name: Weather
weather.desc: Displays the current weather and a forecast for the next 4 days.

settings.location_placeholder: Enter a location and press Enter
